title: Game crashes when i get ingame.
body: The game crashes when its done loading, and we get in a game. I can move my champ for 10seconds, after it drops me out, and i have to recconect. Its really bad too miss the first minion wave every game. Help please

replies.body: Do you get a network crash reconnection message or something along the lines of "bugsplat"? Additionally, are you running Windows 10?
